entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
